featured.text: Many times the man screamed, “Say ‘Catano’ or I’ll kill you!”
The parrot was screaming at the fourth, “Say ‘Catano’ or I’ll kill you!” 21.
He could not say the name of his native town, Catano.
The man (23) everything he could to teach the parrot to say “Catano,” but he never (24) .

definition.zh_def: 一種小型的水生生物，通常生活在淡水或海水中，屬於魚類或其他水生動物。
definition.en_def: A type of small aquatic creature, typically found in freshwater or saltwater, belonging to fish or other aquatic animals.
definition.example: The catano swam gracefully through the clear waters of the lake.
